[Page Title: Happenings — Bar Mash]

Daily Happenings Monday: Live Music & Prime Rib Special 
Live music 9-12
Tuesday: Taco Tuesday & $8 Palomas or Margaritas Wednesday: Burger Night & Bocce League 
Mash Burger, fries, and a High Life for just $12.
Thursday: Trivia & Ramen Night 
Team trivia from 7-9 p.m.
Friday: Whiskey Flight Night & Ramen Special Happy Hour Monday-Saturday 4-6PM

[Page Title: Private Events — Bar Mash]

private event inquiry

[Page Title: Menu — Bar Mash]

MASHMAS menu November 10- December 31

HAPPY HOUR
MON - SAT | 4PM - 6PM evan williams 1783 (1 oz pour) 3   | DAILY RED OR WHITE WINE 6   |   HOUSE DAIQUIRI 7 FOUNDERS ALL DAY IPA 4  |   1 OFF DRAFT BEERS   |   high life draft 2.50 SPINACH ARTICHOKE DIP 7     SINGLE BURGER 7 CHIPS AND HOUSE MADE QUESO 5 SINGLE TACO 5 SOFT PRETZEL 5 
snacks
Giant Soft Pretzels  9 
housemade served with queso, honey mustard, and sea salt
fried pickles 10 
sprinkled in Mash Rub, served with housemade ranch
SPINACH ARTICHOKE DIP 10 
spinach, artichoke, cream cheese, parmesan, pesto-herbed crispy lavash
tacos (2). 13 
served with jicama slaw, queso fresco, chili lime aioli
choice of: chorizo, fried chicken, duck confit, mushroom loaded tots 12 
bacon, house queso, ranch, scallions
FRIED BRUSSELS 10 
fried brussel sprouts, pomegranate molasses, diced apples, roasted garlic vin

HOLIDAY SPecials
prime rib CHILLI 14 
beef prime rib, kidney beans, cheddar, scallions, sour cream
chicken Tenders 13 
tenders breaded in house, served with ranch & choice of:
Carolina Gold BBQ, honey mustard, or Buffalo PIGS IN A BLANKET 10 
beef franks, puff pastry, honey mustard
meatballs 14 
three housemade meatballs, parmesan, red sauce
Chicken WINGS 14 
buffalo chicken wings

choose your spice level
mild, medium, hot 
factory classics
all sandwiches served with chips | substituted fries for +$2 CAESAR salad 14 
Romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, garlic croutons, parmesan, creamy Caesar dressing
add grilled or fried chicken…+5 harvest salad 15 
artisan lettuce grapefruit, feta, crispy chickpeas, shallot, honey thyme vinaigrette
add grilled or fried chicken…+5 nachos 14 
queso, salsa verde, black beans, queso fresco, pickled jalapenos
add chorizo +2 add duck +4 mash burger 17 
double patty, pimento cheese, b & b pickles, bacon jam, Merc sauce, sesame brioche bun
add bacon +3 add fried egg* +2 steak SANDWICH 15 
shaved beef, onion, arugula, green tomato aioli, cheddar rosemary hoagie

SIDES

SMALL/LARGE
CHIPS & QUESO 7 FRIES 3/5 HALF CAESAR SALAD 7 TATER TOTS 3/5 BRUSSEL SPROUTS 5 
DESSERTS
DOUGHNUT HOLES 8 
strawberry and chocolate dipping sauces

SPECIALTY COCKTAILS $16
MAZEL TOV 
Tanqueray Sevilla, grape juice, Fresca
New years NIGHTCAP 
Bulleit Bourbon, hot cocoa, coconut Fernet, almond bitters, toasted marshmallow
MEAN MR GReen 
Don Julio Blanco, Midori, allspice dram, pineapple, lemon, cinnamon
ESPRESSO martini 
Ketel One Vodka, Mr Black Coffee liqueur, cinnamon, Mozza cold brew

AS A SHOT $5
spiced MULE 
Elijah Craig Bourbon, gingerbread syrup, lime juice, ginger beer
HEAT MISER 
Hangar 1 Vodka, pineapple, ginger beer, habanero tincture
MULLED MEAD CIDER 
apple cider, black currant mead, holiday spices, ginger liqueur
WHITE winter 
Hangar 1 Vodka, Cointreau, rosemary simple, lemon, white cranberry juice
bar mash dark horse 
Bullrush Blood Orange Gin, Crown Royal chocolate liqueur, lemon, black walnut bitters
the standard 
Elijah Craig Private Label, gomme syrup, angostura & hopped grapefruit bitters
jello shots 3 classic call cocktails 16
